comment.author: 43729504@N06
comment._content: Look at those eyes. I think he was a good fella who made a small mistake...

comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: He has a kind , Sweet young face.   It was difficult in those days and hopefully his life got better.  Suppose he is in Heaven now.    Life back then was really hard.

comment.author: 53569869@N04
comment._content:
Handsome boy!  
Stole a violin-imagine...he probably was desperate to play it but couldn't afford it...with more money and opportunity who knows what he may have accomplished.

comment.author: 81414584@N07
comment._content: He is fortunate they only gave him a month. Back then the sentences were harsh. I wonder why he wanted the violin. To sell it or to learn how to play the instrument. Hope he had a good life.
